website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price for a mini desktop that ships with Windows 10 preinstalled.
pros: Not the most powerful mini computer on the market, but it has a nice set of features compared to others in its price bracket
Expandable, as you can add more RAM or hard drive capacity later
cons: Doesn’t give you the fastest processing speed in its Celeron CPU

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive and feature rich mini-PC...
customer_reviews.text: This mini-PC is a nice computer for those not needing a large desktop computer. I purchased it with the intent of using it on my TV in my living room or on travel, but I am using it at work for the ability to do school work during my lunch since I can't use work resources for that. It has Windows Home on it and can be upgraded to Professional for about $99. It boots quickly and is responsive to the opening and closing of programs. It is nice that it has many USB ports so that you can plug just about anything into it you might need and two HDMI display ports to run dual displays
customer_reviews.author: Leips63

customer_reviews.title: Solid mini PC with a lot of capability
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option if you need something more than a Raspberry Pi but not the full level of an actual desktop or server. I can see it working well also as a desktop replacement however I am using it as a server running Ubuntu. It has the usual full-fledged bios options as well as the capability of running dual monitors and Windows 10 as it comes pre-loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for two weeks but now will no longer power up. Think it has a faulty internal power supply. Not sure the internal components of this machine will be reliable long term.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it loud
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Functional but the fan sounds like a 747 taking off, and does not shut off. This thing is like a science experiment of a bunch of parts randomly assembled. Sorry I waited months to evaluate this thing but I was hoping to be fair. Usually I have to put it in sleep mode because of the jetlike fan noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ace of Spades

customer_reviews.title: Computer Is Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not even turning on the day after I bought it
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Great for TV use!
customer_reviews.text: I have no problems streaming to a TV, playing simple online games, e-mails and web surfing. It has two HDMI connections and a VGA output and can output to 2 displays. Also you can plug external speakers into the unit via 3.5mm jack. Make sure device close enough to wifi modem. Bluetooth is fine. The best way extend storage capacity up to 128gb is adding a micro sd card or just USB drive to it. Great for in TV use! Be aware Microsoft Office does not included and Microsoft Home can be upgraded to Pro version for additional charge. It comes with the Recovery media creator, you can use recovery drive to rest it or troubleshoot problems or reinstall windows.
customer_reviews.author: Orkhan Alison

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Product wouldn't power up directly out of the box. Not a quality computer.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Turns out to be a cheap faulty computer.
customer_reviews.text: Very light snappy mini PC, hooked it up to my TV with wireless keyboard and mouse. The set up was easy and once all booted no issues with speed. Able to use this as my media device and worked like a charm for 4k videos. Very happy with the cost and quality of the PC. Interested in getting 2 one for my movie room. Last Update- returning and done with it. The computer keeps freezing and I keep having to hard reset and or reboot. I am competent with PCs and this is not a good build computer, guessing it's the cheap parts it's built with.
customer_reviews.author: austin ung

customer_reviews.title: One of the most mini pc ever that i have purchased so far for working and daily usage
customer_reviews.text: Since the begin of the COVID19, we all have shifted from in class teaching to online class, meaning that the usage of zoom and any other online teaching software will be more frequently used. Therefore, I purchased a mini pc for online class only. I connected the mini pc with the tv easily and I have no trouble at end. The pc can handle the online streaming smoothly and performed some basic operation such as reading ppt and writing an assay. The storage of the pc is sufficient for daily usage.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Step Up From The Pi
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a raspberry pi for years and years as a audio workhorse to add functionality to a vintage receiver, playing YouTube music and stuff - as well as functioning as a ftp frontend I can vnc into and not leave my primary computer running while I'm moving photos around. Well, long story short - switching over to this has been ideal. I dont have to deal with any of the raspberry pi shortcomings, I get Intel, I get Windows, and I get better hardware. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cbtlr

customer_reviews.title: No more tower!
customer_reviews.text: Fully functional albeit slow (see Celeron J3455) Windows 10 machine in the NUC style to match my Acer CX13 Chromebox. Plugged it in and started updating Windows. Once complete, I installed a 120GB Samsung SSD from my 10-year-old Windows 7 to 8.1 to 10 nonworking tower. On the new 'D' drive did a Windows backup and installed Office Pro '16 from a portable USB 3 DVD drive. I use Chrome OS daily and Windows minimally, so this thing for $160 after a $20 Amazon coupon is worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: vcorde

customer_reviews.title: did not work right
customer_reviews.text: wanted a new computer, and my cousin has serveral of these, though not same manufacture. Started up okay, but as I was entering name, etc. it went into some kind of loop. had it saying "do not shutoff" same loop for 3 1/2 hours. shut off, next day tried again, same thing, only this time I let it run for over 5 hours would not come out of the loop thing. had to send it back. I am afraid to order another one of these might be the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: jim brumm

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, nice performance
customer_reviews.text: I've updated its memory capacity to 2TB, thanks to its 2.5-Inch SATA slot. Now the mini PC works very well for office use. It supports dual display in 4K resolution, I've tried it with some 4K videos, the display was smooth and without pause. I think It's also suitable for office use, especially for case shows, yes, connect it with a projector would be a good idea too. It has many USB ports, which is a nice feature as well when you have a mouse, portable hard drive, USB flash to connect, you will find it very helpful. It also has build-in Bluetooth, which mean I don't have to buy buy another Bluetooth receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to hook to a tv for my business use. It was so easy to contact to the tv and wireless printer. I also have it connected to a wireless mouse and wireless keyboard. It runs fast and smooth. It may not be the fastest processor,but it is a mini pc . Built quality is pretty good! It with 6gb memory and 128gb storage there seems to be no issue running office software, video or zoom meeting. You go through the regular simple and straightforward Windows setup. Great video output ports and HDMI or vga cover all bases. I love it with 4k quality! No complaints whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: This little thing packs quite the punch.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews indicating that this couldn't be used for gaming, which, may be true to an extent. I haven't tested any super heavy gaming titles, but I have played Age of Empires and RISK online, and it works just great. When there were 1,000+ units on the map on AOE it did start to have a little bit of a stutter, but it was minor and not incredibly noticeable. Needless to say, for casual gaming, it's a pretty nice little box. I use it for work too, and that's not even a question -- it can easily handle basic work tasks (word, excel, wordpress, social media networks, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Gienine & Chris

customer_reviews.title: Portable computer with multiple functionalities!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for my PC tools. It's very practical to use it for drive partitioning or wiping. I was able to boot parted magic from USB with it and it performs very smoothly. The fan helps a lot dissipating the heat on high usage. It could get loud but it's best for the device. Running Windows 10 on it is surprisingly fast. 4GB memory is good enough doing basic tasks like browsing, word processing, or watching Youtube. I was even able to run Moonlight game streaming with it. This thing is so portable and lightweight but could do so much.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. home

customer_reviews.title: Continues to shutdown
customer_reviews.text: After having the unit for about 6 months, it constantly shuts down. After a restart, it will run for a brief time, and then shutdown again. I would like to know if the unit can be replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Fisher, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Mini-PC ideal for lab computer controlling cameras and instruments.
customer_reviews.text: Using this mini-PC to control microscope cameras and other lab equipment with windows based software. Affordable yet lots of usb ports and bluetooth capabilities. The small foot print with hanging bracket allows computer to be attached to the wall or shelf to free up bench space. Came with short HDMI cable and power supply. A 2 GB hard drive was added for backup and extra storage space. The mini-PC recently updated to the latest Windows 10 version without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence W. Lass

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth and fast for such a small thing
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect this to be as fast as it was. As you can see the boot time is only like 30 seconds from my video. This is great for using with your TV. It runs google chrome and i think it’s even fast enough to run some games like Minecraft. I mostly use it for Netflix and YouTube on my TV
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Echorus

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little thing
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with this little thing. Boots up fast. Formatted 2tb hdd no problem. File transfer speed over Ethernet is fast. Recognized and powered 5tb usb3.0 external hdd. Plays 2k movies from external drive but not 4K. 4K plays ok off internal drive, some skipped frames. I would bet you can put a 5tb drive in this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little giant that out performs its price point
customer_reviews.text: I needed a space saving computer to hook to my flatscreen TV to play media files that I have on external drives, and for streaming from the internet. This model does all that and more. You get an Intel Celeron i3 processor, a 64 gig solid state hard drive, 6 gigs of memory, an HDMI port and 3 USB3 inputs, and comes pre-loaded with Windows 10 Professional. Setup was quick and painless out of the box and all for 200 bucks. It’s quiet too, as it’s fanless. While not powerful enough for gaming, it will handle all basic computer chores with ease. I can recommend this as a safe buy.
customer_reviews.author: Drumbeato

customer_reviews.title: 2 Weeks since Purchasing and working really well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mini PC to replace the MINIX mini I purchased in 2017 that just did not have enough storage and has stopped being able to allow Windows 10 updates for the last year and a half. This mini has lots of storage, allowed me to add additional SD card [which the MINIX could not] quick processing speed. So so far so good. I give it a 4 star now but want to put it through it's paces for a little while longer and will come back and give additional rating.
customer_reviews.author: TMA2020

customer_reviews.title: The price .was right
customer_reviews.text: Recently I noticed that my old personal laptop was 14 years old, running windows XP, and I had not moved it from my desk in ten years. I found this little unit on a lightning deal for $169.99 last week and I am pleased so far. I really don't need it to play games just basic functions, this unit has been a home run so far. The Windows 10 pro license was worth it alone. Plenty of USB and HDMI ports to plug in all the basic accessories I already had. I did have dig out some old speakers to hook up to it, but that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A. Roseberry

customer_reviews.title: Works Good, But Super Loud
customer_reviews.text: Works Good and has Windows Pro which is the most important, but fan was super duper loud. it's was not bearable. First I tried to replace fan , that didn't help. Next I just cut out the grill of the fan on the bottom of the case. That did help. Nice PC with out that much noise now.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice n Cute Mini PC
customer_reviews.text: Ready to use, easy to setup, works well for routine use of browsing and light gaming. USB storage can be used to extend storage. Additional hard drive can also be installed. Bluetooth is available for wireless mouse, keyboard and other devices. WiFi as well as Ethernet connectivity is available. The only major shortcoming in the product is low inbuilt storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo rabbit

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than I expected, but still very portable!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a mini pc, specifically for travel. Moving a laptop through airport security is a major pain, so I wanted something that could still browse the web but could also fit in my pocket. This PC gets the job done! As seen in the video, it's a little big but it can still technically fit in your hand. I'll be taking this pc on any of my short or long trips!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDragon64

customer_reviews.title: Super small with cool design
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a portable system to carry videos and play simple Steam games. This little PC was just right. It comes preinstalled with Windows 10 . The initial setup takes some time to boot into the Windows 10 setup, completing the setup, and installing all the updates. But once that is all completed, it works really well.This Mini PC is very tiny, it can save you a lot of room and has a cool design.
customer_reviews.author: eclipse

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: At first blush unit is well designed and well built. The big problem is with all Chinese products the instructions stink. In order to install a SSD card you have to remove the top. The instructions simply state slide the latch to the right and remove the top. However there’s one critical instruction that they failed to mention. In order to open the latch you first have to remove a tiny flat head screw. Once you remove the screw the latch slides easily.
customer_reviews.author: EricDJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for web and MS Office Apps, not gaming.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a low cost computer for using apps like MS Word, Excel, Outlook and web browsing this gets the job done. It is not meant for gaming. Know the limitations and you will be happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Small PC for Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: I use this for PC as a replacement for a chrome box. The PC is very fast and comes complete with Windows 10. Excellent value for the money, the only complaint is that you have 3 USB plugs on side , which can be resolved with a simple adapter. The product does has a fan with a low noise which is not a problem. You will need an external drive for more memory if you have a lot of files.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Media Center PC for almost nothing!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I have purchased the item. Good price and it streams my collection of 4K movies without a glitch. I would not play games on the system, but as a media center - is a perfect solution. Very responsive system. I have placed a 2tb drive which was laying around for local storage and it works great. Highly recommended. Comes with activated Windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: About as powerful as a chromebook but less expensive
customer_reviews.text: excellent for cost efficient distance learning. The wifi stays connected and it doesn't lag or struggle with Chrome internet access. I did download my steam acct just to see what would happen, and the little machine tried, but it wasn't capable of playing anything -- that's ok i got it for school in the time of corona.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good mini PC for work and home
customer_reviews.text: This computer has 8GB ram which is good enough for most of my routine work. Also, it has big storage where I am able to store all my documents and pictures. It has intel graphics also which goes up to clear 4K graphics. I am able to use this for entertainment purpose too at home. I like portability of this device and easy to carry while I am traveling just like laptop. All in all, I really love it !
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: I Strongly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had this mini desktop for a little over a week, and I LOVE it! I recently started a “work from home” job. So, I needed something with decent processing power and speed. Originally, I was using a basic “for home” HP desktop with 1.7 G of processing speed, which was horrible. The lagging was insane. Now that I have this MINI desktop, work is a breeze! It’s super fast, and has virtually no lag time. If you’re working from home or just need a fast and reliable mini desktop, I strongly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Fast, convenient, compact, high quality picture graphic.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this pc for my office, but I AM SO IMPRESSED WITH THE QUALITY. I cannot believe the size if this mini computer and how good it turned out to be. The set up only took 15 minutes, I searched the web, view a video, and open Microsoft, all at the same time, I had no problem with the performance. Don't second guess if you are thinking about purchasing, it is worth every penny. I cannot believe I waited a month to pull the trigger on this!!! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: FAN TO LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good computer a process is good it looks nice you monitor the back of your monitor everything is perfect with this computer but the fan, the fan sounds like static from a TV it is annoying because I didn't know that they still make any type of desktop with fans like this if they change this this would be a hell of a PC. And before I send it back hopefully I can get some feedback on changing the fan
customer_reviews.author: SW1

customer_reviews.title: Mini PC works just fine!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as PC for doing live video calls. It worked just like I had anticipated. Windows 10 is preloaded and allows you to download the software you need. I connected a mic and a webcam without any problems. I was able to get everything done that I needed to which was just normal PC use. I didn't do any gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crashes constantly and now won't boot up.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this little guy. Its small and works as part of my streaming setup. It didn't have to do anything but let me watch twitch to see my chat. Nothing else. Just that. Go on a website only. It can't. So disappointed. Of course it started blue screen crashing after the amazon return window and now I'm stuck with a $200 box. I am computer savvy and have done a windows reinstall and some trouble shooting to no avail. Either I got a lemon or its just a piece of crap. Either way, Don't buy it. Even if your expectations are low like mine. It's a waste of $200. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: This computer is equipped with a Windows system, which is easier to operate than an Android computers. In addition, the memory and storage space are large enough to run most applications. Supporting Bluetooth features allows it to connect to more devices which is more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great product and small size!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenience! I am always work outside, and need a computer to work. This litter guy helps me a lot , very light and small, same size as my phone. I can work at any cafe shop with this little PC. I have a 15.6 inch portable monitor, and connect it to the mini PC, it will become my work station immdiately. The processor that comes with J3455 and up to 2.3GHz with windows 10 pro (64-bit), work with Hdmi/VGA. The most surprise thing is that come with 120GB ssd's, and support 4k resolution. No issue with movie and for work. Total all, it worth to buy, very helpful when need work outside, easy for carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need it for. Not a huge gamer. That's what x box is for. Great for word processing, doing taxes, storing family photos. Streams netflix, tv apps, amazon prime etc very clear and quick, no lag. I love having my tv double as a computer. HDMI ports are awesome. Plenty of storage with the option to expand. I'm very impressed with this and the price is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Fast and reliable
customer_reviews.text: The Mini PC is very compact and light. The storage on it is great, making it a great for my online work. The connection is also great, able to run moives with no trouble. The highlite is the VGA port. It rare to see those but it sure helps a lot to have one of those on this Mini PC.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great little pc, would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: With the pandemic and homeschooling , this pc save us, setting it up was not as difficult and my son loves it , he enjoys playing games and doing his school work! It also has a great speed, Just be careful with the power cord cuz if moved to much may disconnect the pc!
customer_reviews.author: Ad

customer_reviews.title: So far impressed for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the money. I got it for our office receptionist. She uses it for just cloud-based services and playing music for the lobby. We are a day in and the Set up was easy and seems to be working fine. I will update if I have any issues....so no additional news is good news.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Daniel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Small Footprint, with great Multimedia Capability
customer_reviews.text: I love how small and portable this Mini PC is. I added a 2TB 2.5" SSD to it for all of my movies and it works great for this purpose. I can take my 500 movies with me anywhere on vacation, or just convenient at home to pop into a movie if nothing is on TV.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Connect HDMI to HDMI cable (included) to tv and mini pc. Plug adapter (included) into mini pc and outlet. Turn them on. It will ask some simple set up questions and Wi-Fi information. I also connected a mouse and keyboard ( not included) to make things easier. It didn't take long to set up. Now my tv works like a computer! Picture quality is good. The speed is good. It also came with a mounting piece. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Prosser

customer_reviews.title: Good mini computer
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time trying a mini computer. I definitely like this mini compact thing. It's very space saving. I connect it with the portable monitor display,the set up was easy and fast.it is 6gb DDR3,120 GB SSD,the speed is pretty fast which is enough for me to do my work.the pre installed Windows 10 is good,and USB 3.0port has great reading speed too so far, it's working very well.also Price is fair too.
customer_reviews.author: jack chan

customer_reviews.title: Won't come out of sleep
customer_reviews.text: And when I restart it, sometimes it puts out no video signal. I have to unplug it and start it again. Thinking of returning it. It shouldn't be doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Erhard

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy one of these before now! OMG, takes up no space, everything I need is in this small case, ready to go. Fast Ethernet speed, enough memory for me, and as far as disc space, I can always add another portable drive any time I may need it. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Wright

customer_reviews.title: Its great for home theater.
customer_reviews.text: besically i use it for home theater. i use a projector which runs 1080p the small device could just connect to the projector with hdmi port and you get 4 useb port. its perfect for home movie when you finish job and feel tired just relax and watch some movie.
customer_reviews.author: XB

customer_reviews.title: Lots of potentials but disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Like other users mention, the unit gets quite warm under heavy utilizations after extended use resulting in random lock ups and reboots. I tried starting a fresh install of windows thinking it was a driver conflict but same thing happens. The PC just hangs and won't allow me to do anything. The cooling design could be improved to correct thermal issue. I'm very disappointed as i really wanted to like this mini PC.
customer_reviews.author: GXZ

customer_reviews.title: SO COOL!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is no joke! We have it permanently connected to our 82" Smart TV, and it works wonderfully for either downloading or streaming HD quality movies. Outstanding product! Awesome price! Small size and very quiet! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great for basic tasks.
customer_reviews.text: PC works as expected. Performs as to be expected for the cpu it has. Only complaint is the fan noise, it uses a small high rpm fan for cooling the cpu, it's not terribly loud but loud enough to be annoying at times, would of like to have seen maybe a larger fan at a lower rpm. Only had it a few months, basically just using it to live view 4 wifi security cameras and works well for that application. the included bracket for mounting was nice also, i was able to use the vesa mount on the back of the monitor to hide the unit there.
customer_reviews.author: Go Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative if you don’t want to go for big brands
customer_reviews.text: Although it’s small, it’s gets the job done. That’s one thing that’s good about the size. You can pretty much fit it anywhere, whether that’s behind your monitor or whatever. It also has a fan so if you need to use it for a long period of time, it’ll cool off. I don’t use this for intense gaming, but rather just some casual office use. It definitely does a good job if you don’t want to go for the big brands out there I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Slow, overheating, power offs automatically. Not wort it!
customer_reviews.text: Really not worth it. Worked fine for one week but after that the pc shuts down automatically. Looks like it has some problem with overheating. There is also problem connecting to the wifi. Pretty slow with everything and the memory gets full just after one week of use. Don’t recommend it. Go for some reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bibek Dhakal

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit for my application!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size of this unit and it seems to run the applications I need including Youtube Tv, Google calendar application. Use it mainly to run a Calendar for my office so everyone can see what is going on during the day/week/month
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations especially for price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife as a back to school gift. I was completely surprised by the overall (high) quality of the PC and the packaging it came in. Was able to set up and download anti-virus and office suite very quickly. Two things to consider are the limited disk space (meaning you won't be able to overload with programs and files) and no internal speaker. I purchased and installed a 120G micro SD card for extra storage space and connected a bluetooth speaker we already had for sound. I also purchased a wireless keyboard/mouse because there are only (3) USB slots. Good usable computer at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cox

customer_reviews.title: Small and quiet and Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for business. It small and quiet. It handles various apps open at same time with no problem. I use it do zoom business presentation and sign documents over zoom, to do this I have to have different apps open simultaneously and so far it has work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy little unit
customer_reviews.text: Great little pc, it easily mounted to the back of the monitor, which I bought for my wife after her all-in-one pc began to break down. She mainly uses it for web browsing, email, and video/music streaming. For that, it is fast enough to do all that is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Milsom

customer_reviews.title: Fine for price
customer_reviews.text: Fine for the price. We purchased this mostly to play our non-iTunes digital movies (stored on an external hard drive) on our TV. Our youngest does play PBS games on it, but that’s really all. So far it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Are there speakers in there?
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little slow loading websites but other than that it’s great! Oh and I think it’s missing a speaker... I can’t seem to get any noise to come out of it. Definitely a good computer for regular day to day bill paying and leisurely web browsing.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini computer
customer_reviews.text: Everything that one could expect from a mini computer. It’s small and not too fast, but it runs windows 10 ok and has some disk and memory to operate. Just connect a mouse, keyboard and monitor.
customer_reviews.author: IrinaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great mini PC
customer_reviews.text: It is a great size mini PC. It is very good for Internet browsing, Running basic applications are ok. Not for gaming though and it is not built for gaming. It is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sen

customer_reviews.title: Great for basic tasks and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer for internet and basic applications. Purchased this for my grandmother that has limited space for a computer and it has done a great job. It’s not strong enough for gaming being the ram and video graphics card is on the basic side of measure.
customer_reviews.author: jstan022

customer_reviews.title: Great as a office computer.
customer_reviews.text: Computer works great. Just make sure you have it lifted on something high so the heat can come out from the bottom of the computer. You can also put a 2.5 hard drive in it for more hard space.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money, Wi-Fi card failed but fixed for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little computer. The wifi card failed after a month, solved with a cheap usb wifi adapter. It's still an impressive computer for the price, a comprable setup in an Intel NUC would be $700 +.
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: Poor power connection
customer_reviews.text: Poor power connection. I replaced one already and even that had the same issue. The power connection is not at tight connection it is very loose. any little bump you power to the pc
customer_reviews.author: John J. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Highly Recommended, was just what I was looking for to provide internet access to my HD Smart TV. The browsers available on my Sony were useless and totally unusable. This compact unit fits nicely by the TV and was easily setup and works great for my requirements.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mahathey

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i wanted something small but could also handle most tasks! It is probably as strong as a laptop but it is NOT as portable which i like. Good quality ans easy to setup!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: Received the computer on time. Windows loads well. Took some time for the updates but not the mini pc's fault. It is fairly quick for office productivity and general web browsing. Load times from off to on is approximately 30 seconds. I like the compact form factor. Fan is pretty quiet as well. I also like that the storage can be expanded. My only concern is longevity and overheating but so far so good. I will update after 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini pc I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's time to try the new mini pc. Just like other reviews have written, this product is less than $200 after discount, but it has the functions of a previous computer with thousands of dollars. Also, my computer desk can put more things.
customer_reviews.author: Andyzou

customer_reviews.title: A lot of PC in a tiny footprint with USB/HDMI GALORE.
customer_reviews.text: Mighty little box with Win 10 Pro and lots of connectivity options. I dropped a 2TB drive in and hooked it up to my 50" Samsung 4K UHD TV and a wireless keyboard. I'm using it for streaming movies across my network.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Zeus

customer_reviews.title: noisey
customer_reviews.text: My wife is not happy with this computer, as the fan is loud and cycles on and off often.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little pc
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini pc It is fast No noise This pc is great for the average person just needing a small pc to do web browsing word processing and video watching
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice little PC for living room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mini pc to set up a home studio in my living room. As you can see in the pictures, it has 4 USB ports and 2 HDMI ports. That allows you to connect to quite many devices. It only has 64GB storage which is not a lot but I use my own external hard drive when needed. It is not designed for gaming due to its low capacity for performance but it has been perfect for video browsing and basic office usage so far. PS: I will upgrade later as I keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best on for your kids!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for my kid. He using it for doing homework, software development and of course playing games! Just added a 2TB HDD for additional storage. Value for the money. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Naga Pillai

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine but Fan is Loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an Android TV box we used to stream media in our living room. The PC is a great little machine and offers way more capability than the Android box ever did. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because the fan in this sucker is loud and a bit of an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: SRM

customer_reviews.title: great little sytsem
customer_reviews.text: This little box is doing exactly what we needed it to do. Its in our conference room. Gives access to inet and allows for o365 presentations; small out of the way with plenty of performance for meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Turn On
customer_reviews.text: Might be a great little computer. Wouldn't know. Blue LED comes on for a bit.... and then it turns off. End of story. Brand names may be more money but at least they have quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley C. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Manageable Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Yay! My TV is now turned to a smart one. Unlike other smart TVs which are restricted to some weird platforms, mine is totally manageable by myself. Just like a fully functioning pc. I can install any software or download/buffer any movie as much as I like, with a dedicated device. This mini computer also has a nice look and fit into the room nicely, if that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Ahfani Honga

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fast and 64 bit to boot. I'm very happy with this. I'm not a gamer so I can't rate it for that. I've not had it hiccup once since using it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissadad

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is really nice. Setup is fast and easy like any windows 10 machine.It's very compact and quiet. Didn't get very hot for my usage, which is mostly browsing, docs, and spreadsheets. I hooked up an existing 2TB USB drive and re-mapped all the user folders, so data storage was a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: Flor patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not what you may think
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to setup Linux mint on this computer, but it was a pain in the butt getting all the features to work. Got a tower instead and that worked out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: defective, wouldn't power on
customer_reviews.text: This came recommended online with solid reviews, I imagine if you get a working one it got those reviews for a reason. However, if you see the other models you'll see at least a few reviews that had a similar experience to us: plugged it in, the blue light on front lit up, and that was as much as we ever got out of the unit, a nice little blue light. Tried different outlets and different connectors to make sure, and it never powered on. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas R. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: My Dad needed needed something to fit on his very small desk and this was the perfect space saver computer. So far all has been working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyka

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system to use for my customers security camera system monitor. It works well but I think it may be a little too under-powered for the application that runs on it. The system runs extremely hot and freezes frequently which requires either a restart or log off of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Little machine, very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This mini machine packs a big punch. I use it for media streaming and it plays the video files perfectly. No sticking or freezing. And it is so tiny that you can stash it away and it still works very well. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, both DOA
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, plugged it in got message the computer was not turned off properly and needed top gather info. Kept cycling through that until it just shut off. Had a replacement sent and the replacement did the same exact thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud fan
customer_reviews.text: The performance is fine for everyday tasks. The FAN is TOO Loud! After one month I gave up and returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: HAP

customer_reviews.title: mini computer
customer_reviews.text: i like this mini computer.my office old computer is broken.then i ordered this mini computer.its so small when i open the shopping box. i put this mini computer on my office desk and dont use too much space.the fan is not too loud.i wonder how can put everything in this small box!
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: It had all the connectivity need to run my giant monitor and large keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: It is replacing a tower computer that died. The only negative is that the cooling fan is louder that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Reinsch

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work properly. Blue screen everytime after log in. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Can't stream 720p video from netflix, youtube or any other platform.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a media PC for my TV. It is slow, super loud, and plays any HD streaming in a super choppy, unwatchable manner. My previous media PC (original cost $400) was leaps and bounds better. Missed my return window, gonna turn it into a Lubuntu machine.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The computer does what I need it to do. But it is a bit slower than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: jmm

customer_reviews.title: Great computing for low price
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my business as my desktop. For basic computing I find it performs very well for the size. Have not tried using it for gaming or other high performance computing yet. I like the fact that it offers up to 3 monitors and you can easily add a hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great computer!
customer_reviews.text: great compact computer. Much easier to carry than a laptop as long as you have a TV and keyboard set up. The computer is a great machine to use.
customer_reviews.author: atom

customer_reviews.title: small and portable most importantly affordable PC
customer_reviews.text: small and portable most importantly affordable PC I personally use is on chrome OS perfectly for browsing website and YouTube
customer_reviews.author: Si Han Wang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a home media server!
customer_reviews.text: There are many mini PCs but I love this one. First of all it has an internal HDD dock so won't make a mess of cables. Second the GPU can handle most of my video, that's enough for me. But also it's cute and quiet, I can still play some retro games on it, in all a good replacement and upgrade of my raspberry pi.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great little computer
customer_reviews.text: Great little computer, i use it for watching live streams and digital movies online. Perfect for hooking up to my big screan television
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Good for home office
customer_reviews.text: Silent, does not heat up much, and good use for home office/ remote login
customer_reviews.author: Ramazon

product_meta.title: Mini PC, Intel Celeron J3455 Processor(up to 2.3GHz) Windows 10(64-bit) Mini Desktop Computer with HDMI/VGA Port,4GB DDR3/64GB eMMC,Gigabit Ethernet,Dual Band Wi-Fi,Bluetooth 4.2,4K HD
feature_bullets: Intel Celeron Processor: Quad-Core Intel Celeron J3455 Processor.It's base operating frequency 1.5 GHz/s rising to a 2.3 GHz in burst mode.
Windows 10 OS: Pre-installed with Windows 10 Pro (64-bit) OS.
Storage Expansion Options: Built-in 4GB DDR3,64GB eMMC ,it support 2.5-Inch SATA HDD/SSD up to 2TB and support Micro SD card up to 128GB.

Support 4K HD: The mini desktop computer comes with 4K HD Graphics, giving you a best-in-class television experience with true-to-life picture quality,which can be used as a media center to enjoy TV shows or games.
I/O Specifications: Designed with 2 x USB 2.0 ports,2 x USB 3.0 ports ,1 x Gigabit Ethernet port,1 x Micro SD Card port,2 x HDMI port and 1x VGA port support Three Display

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars261 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
